name: Sumo 1 vs 1
description:
Tap to jump and hit the other sumo to make him fall. Use inertia to change direction, and use an effective strategy against your opponents!

Simple controls and infinite strategy possibilities!

- Customizable sumos
- Lots of different stages
- Increase your rank!

Avoid the bombs which will throw you off if you get too near...

The matches consist of 3 rounds, and if you win you will increase in level. Can you become the best sumo?

Customize your sumo by changing its face and color.
